items.title: Origins
items.description: Erwan Heussaff explores some of the lesser-known islands in the Philippines, meeting the people and getting a rare glimpse into their unique traditions.

items.title: One for the Road
items.description: An ensemble of Tastemade’s most adventurous travelers take on the world in this solo travel series.

items.title: Make This Tonight
items.description: Our favorite chefs bring you their go-to dinner recipes and the stories behind them.

items.title: Mad Good Food
items.description: Former NFL player turned chef, Derrell Smith, shows love through food. Whether it’s cooking one of his family-style meals or transforming that meal for one

items.title: All Up In My Grill
items.description: Chef Dale Talde can cook almost anything on a grill and will transform your backyard into an outdoor kitchen!

items.title: Crate to Plate
items.description: Follow the amazing journey of a home-grown Canadian ingredient from its originating source to its final destination.

items.title: Dum Laga Ke India
items.description: Savour the taste of tradition! Ranveer Brar journeys across vibrant cities, uncovering the indelible history and unheard stories of culinary culture in India.

items.title: Spencer's BIG 30
items.description: This is a fast-paced series featuring healthy, hearty meals for four that can be made by anyone in around 30 minutes, for around 30 dollars.

items.title: Flour Power
items.description: Flour Power demystifies the science, the art, and the magic of baking, inspiring viewers to make delicious and beautiful food using wholesome ingredients.

items.title: DNA Dinners
items.description: This series explores the diverse heritages of 16 individuals as they discover their roots through DNA analysis and celebrate them through cooking.

items.title: Pressure's ON
items.description: Take the pressure off weeknight cooking with host Vanessa Gianfrancesco as she prepares mouth-watering recipes using her versatile multi-cooker.

items.title: Cook Like a Chef
items.description: This innovative, ground-breaking series features five young chefs as they explore and explain a myriad of cooking techniques.

items.title: A is for Apple
items.description: One of three hip, young chefs randomly picks a letter of the alphabet and goes shopping for two very different ingredients that start with that letter.

items.title: Bonacini's Italy
items.description: Famed Chef Michael Bonacini cooks his way through 15 Italian regions, exploring the flavours and textures that make these areas unique.

items.title: Fish the Dish
items.description: Follow Chef Spencer Watts as he cooks his favourite seafood dishes in preparation for his new cookbook all about fish.

items.title: MasterChef Australia
items.description: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title.

items.title: Taste the Nation with Padma Lakshmi
items.description: Award-winning cookbook author, host and producer Padma Lakshmi, takes audiences on a journey across America to explore its diverse food culture.

items.title: Foodtastic
items.description: An immersive series with talented artists creating scenes made entirely out of food.

items.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
items.description: Celebrity Chef Gordon Ramsay travels around the world to immerse himself into different cultures and cuisines.

items.title: Run Baby Run
items.description: Sathya's simple life takes a drastic turn after he tries to help an unknown woman in trouble. How will he escape from this complicated situation?
items.crisp: Mature Theme, Some Frightening Scenes, Some Mature Content

items.title: Gulmohar
items.description: Batra family has just four days left to vacate their house of 34 years. Amidst the mayhem, uncertainties of the future, insecurities and secrets surface.

items.title: Alone
items.description: During the pandemic, Kalidasan gets stranded in his newly rented flat which turns out to be haunted. How will he cope with this eerie and mysterious lockdown?
items.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Supernatural Content, Fantasy Violence

items.title: Veera Simha Reddy
items.description: Jai's reunion with his long-lost influential father Veera gets chaotic when the latter's past returns to haunt him. How will Jai save Veera from his ill-fate?

items.title: Sadha Nannu Nadipe
items.description: MJ and Saha's blissful love story takes a hit when he learns about her incurable disease. Battling against the odds, can the couple find their happy ending?

items.title: Malikappuram
items.description: Little Kallu longs for a glimpse of Swami Ayyappan. When she sets out on the pilgrimage to Sabarimala, a mysterious person steps forward to help. Who is he?
items.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Violence, Religious Content

items.title: Raajahyogam
items.description: A car mechanic fakes his identity to pursue the girl of his dreams, unaware of her secrets. When they land in a grave situation, will he choose money or love?

items.title: Sembi
items.description: The quiet life of Veerathayi is upended when her grandchild Sembi gets assaulted. Enraged, she races against the time and takes an extreme step to seek justice.
items.crisp: Sexual Violence, Some Disturbing Scenes, Some Drug Use

items.title: Cadaver
items.description: A high-profile murder baffles the cops when a prison inmate claims responsibility and promises more deaths. Will police surgeon Bhadra crack this mystery?
items.crisp: Mature Theme, Gore, Some Disturbing Scenes

items.title: Good Luck Jerry
items.description: In dire need of money, Jerry gets drawn into the dangerous world of drug trafficking. Things go awry when she decides to quit.
items.studioName: Lyca Productions Private Limited and Colour Yellow Productions Private Limited
items.crisp: Mature Theme, Sexual Humour, Coarse Language, Strong Violence, Drug Content

items.title: Vattam
items.description: A tormented Mano decides to solve his problems after his break-up. But things get worse when he finds himself caught between kidnappers and a distressed couple.

items.title: 19(1)(a)
items.description: The mundane life of a woman running a photocopy shop goes into a tailspin when a revolutionary writer leaves the manuscript of his unpublished novel with her.

items.title: O2
items.description: When a group of bus passengers get stuck in a landslide, a single mother struggles to protect her son and secure his oxygen cylinder from a desperate officer.
items.crisp: Violence, Some Coarse Language, Some Drug Use

items.title: 12th Man
items.description: Eleven friends get together for a bachelor party, but the celebrations go awry because of a phone call and a death. A drunk cop steps in to unravel the mystery.

items.title: Taanakkaran
items.description: Spurred by his dark past, Arivu wants to become a police officer. However, his training instructor Moorthy may become a hurdle and shatter his dreams.
items.crisp: Violence, Some Coarse Language, Some Disturbing Scenes

items.title: Kaun Pravin Tambe?
items.description: Relentless effort can make an underdog rise to the top, and cricketer Pravin Tambe's extraordinary journey proves why age is just a number.

items.title: Lalitham Sundaram
items.description: Too busy with jobs, three siblings lose their connection to their family. Reuniting for their mom's death anniversary, will her last wish bring back lost love?

items.title: Maaran
items.description: Madhimaaran Sathyamoorthy is an honest investigative journalist. When he uncovers a scam, the professional risks start threatening his personal happiness.
items.crisp: Violence, Some Coarse Language, Some Disturbing Scenes

items.title: A Thursday
items.description: Naina, a playschool teacher, takes 16 students hostage. Rattling the police and the leaders, her demands send shockwaves through the country.

items.title: Bro Daddy
items.description: Eesho and Anna's families are close-knit friends. Their parents want them married, but both skillfully avoid it. What are they hiding?

items.title: Zakhm
items.description: Shaan Sengupta, the night manager of Dhaka's Hotel Orient Pearl, gets embroiled in the arms-dealing world of billionaire Shelly Rungta for going beyond duty for a special guest.

items.title: Khabardaar
items.description: Vasya's slum-dog life is an uphill struggle. His only respite, and lady love, is Madhu, a sex worker. One day, his kindness gets rewarded when he receives an old lady's blessings.

items.title: Sarju, The Beginning
items.description: A worker at a mining site in Dhegohaat Forest makes a unique find because of which Rueben Bhatta wants that government-protected land, but it belongs to a tribe that hates outsiders.

items.title: It's Time to Hear My Story
items.description: Malaika's close friends and family cheer her as she embarks on a new journey. Later, a friendly chit-chat with Farah Khan leads to a discussion about Malaika's past and present.

items.title: Plunged into Darkness
items.description: It's been six months since Divya's fall, and she is still in a coma. Rohit and Daniel try to sell her sports centre. Upon hitting a roadblock, Rohit does the unthinkable.

items.title: Sher Aur Magarmachh
items.description: As the Roys celebrate their biggest merger, a shootout in their factory, killing 40 workers, puts everything at stake. A game of power begins, and it is blood versus blood.

items.title: Termination
items.description: Shekhar is laid off from his job and forced to move back to his hometown. He reconnects with his friends after two years, which leads to some shocking revelations.

items.title: The Beginning
items.description: In the wake of a deadly terrorist attack in Daman, a unique first-responder unit - the Hawks - is formed under Ranjan Malik and Jaspreet Bhatti.

items.title: Bhulekha

items.detail: Strong violence and gore, Mild language, Disturbing scenes, Some Nudity

items.title: A Perfect Family
items.description: Eminent lawyer Bikram Chandra's happy life takes a nosedive when his wife, Anuradha, stabs him. Cops are baffled with her, and finding a lawyer for her looks impossible.

items.description: In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.

items.title: Angrezi Medium
items.description: Champak, a simple Mithai-seller, will go to any lengths to fulfil daughter Tarika's dream of studying in London, triggering a chain of hilarious misadventures.

items.title: Tanhaji
items.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

items.title: Bala
items.description: Balmukund Shukla's pride lies in his hair, but premature baldness robs him of more than just his looks. With love at stake, will he have a 'hairy'-tale ending?

items.title: Arjun Reddy
items.description: A short-tempered yet brilliant young medical surgeon immerses himself in drugs and alcohol when his lady-love is forced to marry someone else.

items.title: Housefull 4
items.description: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

items.title: The Past
items.description: When a budding writer moves to a hill station to write her new book, little does she know that an evil plot is about to unfold and take her into the past.

items.title: Chhichhore
items.description: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.

items.description: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.

items.description: Five ordinary men, one global terrorist, witness India's biggest manhunt operation in this film inspired by true events.

items.description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

items.title: Badhaai Ho

items.title: Taqdeer
items.description: Avinash gets separated from his childhood love Priya. Will fate play its part and bring the two estranged lovers together as grown-ups?

items.description: Why did Kattappa kill Amarendra Baahubali? Find out the answer to this monumental question as you watch Amarendra's son in action in the sequel.

items.title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
items.description: A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey from a ticket collector to a celebrated sportsman.

items.title: Lalit Shokeen
items.description: A scientist by profession and a filmmaker by passion, this social media celebrity knows exactly how to tickle your funny bone.

items.title: Date with Senior - College Romance
items.description: Kush has a huge crush on his college senior, Shikha, but she already has a boyfriend. While helping Shikha follow her dreams, does Kush still stand a chance?

items.title: Bhuvan Bam
items.description: India's favourite internet star is here! Do not miss the heavy dose of hilarious and relatable videos.

items.description: When maths becomes an insurmountable challenge, Veera's father forces him to join tutorial classes. There he faces another challenge - the tutor.

items.description: A show where it all begins and ends with food and in between there's cooking, eating, and sharing the many tastes of India. Watch these easy and quick recipes.

items.title: Amit Bhadana LL.B
items.description: Amit is a man with a mission; to become the best lawyer in the world. But that's a lot harder to do than to desire.

items.description: Cousins Sekhar and Harish fall in love with Tulasi. A frenzy begins when both struggle to confess their feelings. Whom will Tulasi choose?

items.description: Bhumi brings her boyfriend, Veer home to meet her family. But with hilarious lies, it proves to be harder than expected to impress them.

items.description: Siddharth, a vlogger, stumbles upon Sravya, a singer, on one of his trips. These opposing personalities then set out on a journey together.

items.description: On her way to her tuition class, Aazhiya get kidnapped and Raja gets a call for ransom. What happens next will leave you in splits.

items.description: How difficult can it be for the principal and college staff to manage a bunch of troublesome students? Here are a few examples, offering a barrel of laughs.
